content: The Entropia Item Stash Tool Pricelist creation is being overhauled
points: - The copy fancy html button to copy pricelist html including js functionality will be moved to be contained within a pricelist creation popup containing some options
- once completed users will be able to specify wether to include items for sale, item purchase offers, or both
- users will also be able to easily change an image url and some other basic options for customizing their pricelist
- I intend to include options such as background image, background color, text options, etc for further customization

content: Made some small fixes and changes to the Entropia Item Stash Tool
points: - The copy fancy html button to copy pricelist html including js functionality has been modified so it now appears in a text box. the user must now copy it themselves, this was done due to the limitations of the  js functionality to copy straight to clipboard being surpassed

- The restock,edit,sell buttons will now be disabled until the user clicks the load stash button and an item stash has been succesfully loaded. this is required because currently it will not function properly before loading a saved item stash. which should be expected. but now a user might understand this more intuitively with these changes
- all aspects of the tool should now have basic functionality working properly...hopefully.

content: i fixed some of the appearance of some elements in the sus os
points: entropia item stash tool subwindows background is no longer completely transparant,it's easier to see inputs now
started fixing entropia calender appearance, fullcalender css styling is a pain in the ass to mess with. I'm not finished yet,hopefully tomorrow.

developer: Jaedraze aka General Jimbobbityboo of Secret Universal Services Society
content: Our main goal is to provide a comprehensive assistant platform for colonists in the Entropia system, offering a range of tools, information, and resources to enrich their gaming experience. While our current focus is on Planet Arkadia, we intend to gradually expand to include content regarding other planets and celestial bodies within Entropia Universe.
points: I've added a YouTube embed for music. Scroll down to learn more!
